original_text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed; and the number of the men was about five thousand.
korean_text: 말씀을 들은 사람 중에 믿는 자가 많으니 남자의 수가 약 오천이나 되었더라

sentences.original_text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 말씀을 들은 많은 사람들이 믿었고

sentences.original_text: and the number of the men was about five thousand
